name: Space Shooter (Therstrum)
description:
Here is the result of my first 2 weeks in game development. A small demo for a rogue-like space shooter. Can you make it to the end? How about with a score of 100%?

To play the game:

1. Download the zip file
2. Extract the folder
3. Doubleclick Space Shooter Protoype.exe

I'd love for your feedback! Please let me know what you think at: https://twitter.com/therstrum. Follow me for updates on the game and when the next demo is available!
